en-US.summary: A DI.FM, RadioTunes, ROCKRADIO, JAZZRADIO and ClassicalRadio aggregator for Alexa.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask my radio to play Bossa Nova
Alexa, ask my radio what is playing
Alexa, ask my radio to play a channel from ClassicalRadio
en-US.name: The Big Five
en-US.description: A DI.FM, RadioTunes, ROCKRADIO, JAZZRADIO and ClassicalRadio aggregator for Alexa.
